function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Difficulty in managing project teams due to remote work","Impact":"Decreased efficiency in project management and monitoring","Mitigation":"Implement remote work management tools and regular online check-ins","Technologies":"Remote project management software, video conferencing tools","People":"Management team, project staff","Owner":"Senior management, project managers"},{"Description":"Inability to conduct site investigations and health inspections","Impact":"Increased risk of unsafe work measures and project delays","Mitigation":"Use remote monitoring technologies and conduct virtual inspections","Technologies":"IoT sensors, drones, video conferencing tools","People":"Site staff, management team","Owner":"Health and safety officers, project managers"},{"Description":"Threats to data validity due to remote data collection","Impact":"Inaccurate or incomplete data leading to unreliable conclusions","Mitigation":"Use multiple data collection methods and verify data accuracy with participants","Technologies":"Cloud-based data storage, collaboration tools, video conferencing tools","People":"Research participants, data collectors","Owner":"Research team, data analysts"}]}
